verbose_text: Identifying the SAD risk factor FERMT2 as a modifier of both cellular phenotypes, the authors targeted FERMT2 with CRISPR / Cas9 mutagenesis, confirming that reducing its levels in neurons can decrease Abeta secretion and tau phosphorylation [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Cas9 mutagenesis, confirming that reducing its levels in neurons can decrease Abeta secretion and tau phosphorylation
